game.name: Smart Boy Ride
game.description:
One of the latest free online games to play for boys, Smart Boy Ride is an amazing driving game with awesome graphics and easy-to-use interface. You can play this cool racing game alone or with your friends and have the fun to the fullest.  In this popular flash game, you have to help Smart Boy to reach his target. Driving on the rugged road requires excellent driving skills and a good hand-to-eye coordination. 

In this fantastic bicycle driving game, all you need to do is avoid the obstacles by jumping over them and win each level successfully. You can achieve the higher scores by collecting the energy drinks. It is also possible to double your score by just collecting the helmets that you find on your way while playing this flash game. Play this game to have huge fun and say goodbye to all your sadness! 

This casual bicycle riding game is back with some extra challenging levels. You have to face the different challenge at each level. The level of challenges increases after each level. In order to reach the next level, you have to complete the previous one. Helping Smart Boy to reach the finish line will surely give you an unforgettable online gaming experience. The more energy drinks and helmets you collect on your way, the higher your scores will be at the end of each level. 

Get yourself prepared and use the right timing to jump over a variety of big rocks, if you seriously do not want to lose this highly interesting racing game.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Smart Boy Ride at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
